name: Mango Health
long_description:
Mango Health is building the market-leading AI Guide for OCD. OCD is often hidden in plain sight, with research showing it takes an average of 12 years to diagnose, and nearly 2% of the world population affected.  We are on a mission to improve accessibility to the best resources available. With a focus on ERP like sessions, 24/7 support, and countless AI-guided lessons - we are looking to bring motivation and meaning back to the lives of millions at a fraction of the cost of traditional treatment. 

Start today at TheMangoHealth.com :)
